channel.title: CVE Feed for N.O.U.S. Open Useful and Simple -- Event post
channel.description: The latest CVEs for N.O.U.S. Open Useful and Simple -- Event post

item.title: CVE-2023-49179|2024-08-02T21:53:43.443Z -- n.o.u.s.%20open%20useful%20and%20simple -- event%20post
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in N.O.U.S. Open Useful and Simple Event post allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Event post: from n/a through 5.8.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-38735|2024-07-12T15:37:49.534Z -- n.o.u.s.%20open%20useful%20and%20simple -- event%20post
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in N.O.U.S. Open Useful and Simple Event post allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Event post: from n/a through 5.9.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-38735|2024-08-02T04:19:20.302Z -- n.o.u.s.%20open%20useful%20and%20simple -- event%20post
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in N.O.U.S. Open Useful and Simple Event post allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Event post: from n/a through 5.9.5.
